title: Is We Dumb? | Photoshop. Lips. Lawn Mower. Mike Tyson.
description:
Quick question. When you owe someone a little money, have you ever considered making and selling bombs in order to payoff your debt? We didn't think so. Let's talk about that, getting your ass kicked by Mike Tyson, what in heck Michelle Branch has been up to, how much lube is too much lube, and more on today's episode of Is We Dumb?!

New episodes every Wednesday at 12pm PST

Watch this episode on YouTube: https://youtu.be/hq-XTJHQZ6g
